oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Harding Hall at Lipscomb University, Nashville, Tennessee, 1981 April
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of Harding Hall dormitory at Lipscomb University, Nashville, Tennessee, April 1981. Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
